name: Jacobus Henricus
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za výnimočné služby ktoré poskytol svojim objavom zákonov chemickej dynamiky a osmotického tlaku v roztokoch
contribution-en: for his discovery of the laws of chemical dynamics and osmotic pressure in solutions

name: Hermann Emil
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za výnimočné služby ktoré poskytol svojou prácou na syntéze cukrov a purínov
contribution-en: for his work on sugar and purine syntheses

name: Svante August
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za výnimočné služby ktoré poskytol pri pokroku v chémii svojou elektrolytickou teóriou disociácie
contribution-en: for his electrolytic theory of dissociation

name: Sir William
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za služby pri objave inertných plynných prvkov vo vzduchu a za určenie ich miesta v periodickom systéme
contribution-en: for his discovery of the inert gaseous elements in air, and his determination of their place in the periodic system

name: Johann Friedrich Wilhelm Adolf Ritter
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za služby pri pokroku v organickej chémii a v chemickom priemysle prostredníctvom svojej práce na organických farbivách a hydroaromatických zlúčeninách
contribution-en: for the advancement of organic chemistry and the chemical industry, through his work on organic dyes and hydroaromatic compounds

name: Ferdinand Frederick Henri
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za výnimočné služby ktoré poskytol svojim výskumom a izoláciou prvku fluór, ako aj za vývoj elektrickej pece, ktorá je po ňom pomenovaná
contribution-en: for his investigation and isolation of the element fluorine, and for [the electric furnace called after him

name: Eduard
contribution-sk: za svoj biochemický výskum a za objav bezbunkového kvasenia
contribution-en: for his biochemical researches and his discovery of cell-free fermentation

name: Sir Ernest
contribution-sk: za svoj výskum v oblasti rozpadu prvkov a chémie rádioaktívnych látok
contribution-en: for his investigations into the disintegration of the elements, and the chemistry of radioactive substances

name: Friedrich Wilhelm
contribution-sk: ako uznanie za prácu v oblasti katalýzy a za svoj výskum v oblasti základných princípov riadiacich chemickú rovnováhu a rýchlosť reakcie
contribution-en: for his work on catalysis and for his investigations into the fundamental principles governing chemical equilibria and rates of reaction

name: Otto
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na poli acyklických zlúčenín
contribution-en: for his services to organic chemistry and the chemical industry by his pioneer work in the field of alicyclic compounds

name: Maria
contribution-sk: za jej objav rádia a polónia a ďalšieho štúdia rádia
contribution-en: for the discovery of the elements radium and polonium, by the isolation of radium and the study of the nature and compounds of this remarkable element

name: François Auguste Victor
contribution-sk: za jeho objav Grignardovho činidla
contribution-en: for the discovery of the  Grignard reagent

name: Paul
contribution-sk: za jeho metódu hydrogenácie organických zlúčenín
contribution-en: for his method of hydrogenating organic compounds in the presence of finely disintegrated metals

name: Alfred
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na spájaní atómov v molekulách
contribution-en: for his work on the linkage of atoms in molecules  especially in inorganic chemistry

name: Theodore William
contribution-sk: za jeho určenie atómovej hmotnosti veľkého počtu prvkov
contribution-en: for his accurate determinations of the atomic weight of a large number of chemical elements

name: Richard Martin
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum rastlinných pigmentov
contribution-en: for his researches on plant pigments, especially chlorophyll

name: Fritz
contribution-sk: za jeho syntézu amoniaku
contribution-en: for the synthesis of ammonia from its elements

name: Walther Hermann
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu v termochémii
contribution-en: for his work in thermochemistry

name: Frederick
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na chémii rádioaktívnych látok a výskum izotopov
contribution-en: for his contributions to our knowledge of the chemistry of radioactive substances, and his investigations into the origin and nature of isotopes

name: Francis William
contribution-sk: za jeho objav izotopov veľkého množstva nerádioaktívnych prvkov a za jeho celočíselné pravidlo
contribution-en: for his discovery, by means of his mass spectrograph, of isotopes, in a large number of non-radioactive elements, and for his enunciation of the whole-number rule

name: Fritz
contribution-sk: za jeho objav metódy mikroanalýzy organických látok
contribution-en: for his invention of the method of micro-analysis of organic substances

name: Richard Adolf
contribution-sk: za jeho dôkaz heterogénnej podstaty koloidných roztokov a použité metódy
contribution-en: for his demonstration of the heterogeneous nature of colloid solutions and for the methods he used

name: Theodor
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na disperzných systémoch
contribution-en: for his work on disperse systems

name: Heinrich Otto
contribution-sk: za jeho objav bilových kyselín a príbuzných látok
contribution-en: for his investigations of the constitution of the bile acids and related substances

name: Adolf Otto Reinhold
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum sterolov a ich spojenie s vitamínmi
contribution-en: for his research into the constitution of the sterols and their connection with the vitamins

name: Arthur
contribution-sk: za ich objav fermentácie cukrov a fermentívnych enzýmov
contribution-en: for their investigations on the fermentation of sugar and fermentative enzymes

name: Hans Karl August Simon
contribution-sk: za ich objav fermentácie cukrov a fermentívnych enzýmov
contribution-en: for their investigations on the fermentation of sugar and fermentative enzymes

name: Hans
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum hemínu a chlorofylu
contribution-en: for his researches into the constitution of haemin and chlorophyll and especially for his synthesis of haemin

name: Carl
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky k chemickým vysokotlakovým metódam
contribution-en: for their contributions to the invention and development of chemical high pressure methods

name: Friedrich Karl Rudolph
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky k chemickým vysokotlakovým metódam
contribution-en: for their contributions to the invention and development of chemical high pressure methods

name: Irving
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu v hraničnej chémii
contribution-en: for his discoveries and investigations in surface chemistry

name: Harold Clayton
contribution-sk: za jeho objav ťažkej vody
contribution-en: for his discovery of heavy hydrogen

name: Frédéric
contribution-sk: za ich syntézu nových rádioaktívnych prvkov
contribution-en: for their synthesis of new radioactive elements

name: Irène
contribution-sk: za ich syntézu nových rádioaktívnych prvkov
contribution-en: for their synthesis of new radioactive elements

name: Petrus Josephus Wilhelmus
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na molekulárnej štruktúre výskumom dipólového momentu a difrakcie röntgenových lúčov a elektrónov v plynoch
contribution-en: for his work on molecular structure through his investigations on dipole moments and the diffraction of X-rays and electrons in gases

name: Sir Walter Norman
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na uhľovodíkoch a vitamíne C
contribution-en: for his investigations on carbohydrates and vitamin C

name: Paul
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na karotenoidoch, flavínoch a vitamínoch A a B2
contribution-en: for his investigations on carotenoids, flavins and vitamins A and B2

name: Richard
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na karotenoidoch a vitamínoch
contribution-en: for his work on carotenoids and vitamins

name: Adolf Friedrich Johann
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu o pohlavných hormónoch
contribution-en: for his work on sex hormones

name: Leopold
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na polymethylénoch a vyšších terpénoch
contribution-en: for his work on polymethylenes and higher terpenes

name: György
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na využití izotopov ako značkovačov pre štúdium chemických procesov
contribution-en: for his work on the use of isotopes as tracers in the study of chemical processes

name: Otto
contribution-sk: za jeho objav štiepenia ťažkých atómových jadier
contribution-en: for his discovery of the fission of heavy nuclei

name: Artturi Ilmari
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum v chémii agrikultúry a výživy
contribution-en: for his research and inventions in agricultural and nutrition chemistry, especially for his fodder preservation method

name: James Batcheller
contribution-sk: za jeho objav, že enzýmy je možné kryštalizovať
contribution-en: for his discovery that enzymes can be crystallized

name: John Howard
contribution-sk: za ich prípravu enzýmov a vírových proteínov v čistej forme
contribution-en: for their preparation of enzymes and virus proteins in a pure form

name: Wendell Meredith
contribution-sk: za ich prípravu enzýmov a vírových proteínov v čistej forme
contribution-en: for their preparation of enzymes and virus proteins in a pure form

name: Sir Robert
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum rastlinných produktov, obzvlášť alkaloidov
contribution-en: for his investigations on plant products of biological importance, especially the alkaloids

name: Arne Wilhelm Kaurin
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum elektroforézy a adsorpčnú analýzu
contribution-en: for his research on electrophoresis and adsorption analysis, especially for his discoveries concerning the complex nature of the serum proteins

name: William Francis
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky v poli chemickej termodynamiky
contribution-en: for his contributions in the field of chemical thermodynamics, particularly concerning the behaviour of substances at extremely low temperatures

name: Otto Paul Hermann
contribution-sk: za ich objav a vývoj diénovej syntézy (Diels-Alderova reakcia)
contribution-en: for their discovery and development of the diene synthesis

name: Kurt
contribution-sk: za ich objav a vývoj diénovej syntézy (Diels-Alderova reakcia)
contribution-en: for their discovery and development of the diene synthesis

name: Edwin Mattison
contribution-sk: za ich objavy v chémii transuránových prvkov
contribution-en: for their discoveries in the chemistry of transuranium elements

name: Glenn Theodore
contribution-sk: za ich objavy v chémii transuránových prvkov
contribution-en: for their discoveries in the chemistry of transuranium elements

name: Archer John
contribution-sk: za ich vynález časticovej chromatografie
contribution-en: for their invention of partition chromatography

name: Richard Laurence
contribution-sk: za ich vynález časticovej chromatografie
contribution-en: for their invention of partition chromatography

name: Hermann
contribution-sk: za ich objavy na poli makromolekulárnej chémie
contribution-en: for his discoveries in the field of macromolecular chemistry

name: Linus Carl
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum podstaty chemickej väzby
contribution-en: for his research into the nature of the chemical bond and its application to the elucidation of the structure of complex substances

name: Vincent
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na zlúčeninách síry, obzvlášť prvej syntéze polypeptidického hormónu
contribution-en: for his work on biochemically important sulphur compounds, especially for the first synthesis of a polypeptide hormone

name: Sir Cyril Norman
contribution-sk: za ich výskum mechanizmu chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their researches into the mechanism of chemical reactions

name: Nikolaj Nikolajevič
contribution-sk: za ich výskum mechanizmu chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their researches into the mechanism of chemical reactions

name: Sir Alexander R.
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na nukleotidoch a koenzýmoch nukleotidov
contribution-en: for his work on nucleotides and nucleotide co-enzymes

name: Frederick
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na primárnej štruktúre proteínov, obzvlášť inzulínu
contribution-en: for his work on the structure of proteins, especially that of insulin

name: Jaroslav
contribution-sk: za jeho objav a vývoj polarografických metód analýzy
contribution-en: for his discovery and development of the polarographic methods of analysis

name: Willard Frank
contribution-sk: za jeho metódu využitia uhlíka-14 pre určovanie veku
contribution-en: for his method to use carbon-14 for age determination in archaeology, geology, geophysics, and other branches of science

name: Melvin
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum v oblasti využívania oxidu uhličitého v rastlinách
contribution-en: for his research on the carbon dioxide assimilation in plants

name: Max Ferdinand
contribution-sk: za ich výskum štruktúr globulárnych bielkovín
contribution-en: for their studies of the structures of globular proteins

name: John Cowdery
contribution-sk: za ich výskum štruktúr globulárnych bielkovín
contribution-en: for their studies of the structures of globular proteins

name: Karl Waldemar
contribution-sk: za ich objavy vzťahujúce sa na vyššie polyméry
contribution-en: for their discoveries in the field of the chemistry and technology of high polymers

name: Giulio
contribution-sk: za ich objavy vzťahujúce sa na vyššie polyméry
contribution-en: for their discoveries in the field of the chemistry and technology of high polymers

name: Dorothy Mary Crowfoot
contribution-sk: za jej odhodlanie a úspechy v použití röntgenových lúčov na výskum štruktúr dôležitých biochemických látok
contribution-en: for her determinations by X-ray techniques of the structures of important biochemical substances

name: Robert Burns
contribution-sk: za jeho úspechy v organickej syntéze
contribution-en: for his outstanding achievements in the art of organic synthesis

name: Robert S.
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na chemických väzbách a elektronickej štruktúre molekúl
contribution-en: for his fundamental work concerning chemical bonds and the electronic structure of molecules by the molecular orbital method

name: Manfred
contribution-sk: za ich štúdium extrémne rýchlych chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their studies of extremely fast chemical reactions, effected by disturbing the equilibrium by means of very short pulses of energy

name: Ronald George
contribution-sk: za ich štúdium extrémne rýchlych chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their studies of extremely fast chemical reactions, effected by disturbing the equilibrium by means of very short pulses of energy

name: George
contribution-sk: za ich štúdium extrémne rýchlych chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their studies of extremely fast chemical reactions, effected by disturbing the equilibrium by means of very short pulses of energy

name: Lars
contribution-sk: za objav recipročných relácií nesúcich jeho meno
contribution-en: for the discovery of the reciprocal relations bearing his name, which are fundamental for the thermodynamics of irreversible processes

name: Derek Harold Richard
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky o vývoji konceptu konformácií
contribution-en: for their contributions to the development of the concept of conformation and its application in chemistry

name: Odd
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky o vývoji konceptu konformácií
contribution-en: for their contributions to the development of the concept of conformation and its application in chemistry

name: Luis Federico
contribution-sk: za jeho objav sacharidových nukleotidov a odhalenie ich úlohy v biosyntéze cukrov
contribution-en: for his discovery of sugar nucleotides and their role in the biosynthesis of carbohydrates

name: Gerhard
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky k elektrónovej štruktúre a geometrii molekúl, hlavne voľných radikálov
contribution-en: for his contributions to the knowledge of electronic structure and geometry of molecules, particularly free radicals

name: Christian Boehmer
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na ribonukleáze
contribution-en: for his work on ribonuclease, especially concerning the connection between the amino acid sequence and the biologically active conformation

name: Stanford
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevok k pochopeniu spojenia medzi chemickou štruktúrou a katalytickou aktivitou ribonukleovej molekuly
contribution-en: for their contribution to the understanding of the connection between chemical structure and catalytic activity of the active centre of the ribonuclease molecule

name: William Howard
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevok k pochopeniu spojenia medzi chemickou štruktúrou a katalytickou aktivitou ribonukleovej molekuly
contribution-en: for their contribution to the understanding of the connection between chemical structure and catalytic activity of the active centre of the ribonuclease molecule

name: Ernst Otto
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na chémii organokovových zlúčenín
contribution-en: for their pioneering work, performed independently, on the chemistry of the organometallic, so called sandwich compounds

name: Geoffrey
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na chémii organokovových zlúčenín
contribution-en: for their pioneering work, performed independently, on the chemistry of the organometallic, so called sandwich compounds

name: Paul John
contribution-sk: za jeho základnú prácu, tak teoretickú ako aj experimentálnu, v oblasti fyzikálnej chémie makromolekúl
contribution-en: for his fundamental work, both theoretical and experimental, in the physical chemistry of macromolecules

name: John Warcup
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na stereochémii enzýmovo-katalyzovaných reakcií
contribution-en: for his work on the stereochemistry of enzyme-catalyzed reactions

name: Vladimir
contribution-sk: za jeho výskum v stereochémii organických molekúl a reakcií
contribution-en: for his research into the stereochemistry of organic molecules and reactions

name: William N.
contribution-sk: za jeho štúdium štruktúry bórovodíkov
contribution-en: for his studies on the structure of boranes illuminating problems of chemical bonding

name: Ilya
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky k nerovnovážnej termodynamike
contribution-en: for his contributions to non-equilibrium thermodynamics, particularly the theory of dissipative structures

name: Peter Dennis
contribution-sk: za jeho formuláciu chemiosmotickej teórie
contribution-en: for his contribution to the understanding of biological energy transfer through the formulation of the chemiosmotic theory

name: Herbert Charles
contribution-sk: za ich spoločný rozvoj použitia zlúčenín obsahujúcich bór a fosfor, samostatne, za činidlá v organickej syntéze
contribution-en: for their development of the use of boron- and phosphorus-containing compounds, respectively, into important reagents in organic synthesis

name: Georg
contribution-sk: za ich spoločný rozvoj použitia zlúčenín obsahujúcich bór a fosfor, samostatne, za činidlá v organickej syntéze
contribution-en: for their development of the use of boron- and phosphorus-containing compounds, respectively, into important reagents in organic synthesis

name: Paul
contribution-sk: za jeho základné štúdium biochémie nukleových kyselín, a zvlášť rekombinátu-DNA
contribution-en: for his fundamental studies of the biochemistry of nucleic acids, with particular regard to recombinant-DNA

name: Walter
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky týkajúce sa určenia bázových postupností v nukleových kyselinách
contribution-en: for their contributions concerning the determination of base sequences in nucleic acids

name: Frederick
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky týkajúce sa určenia bázových postupností v nukleových kyselinách
contribution-en: for their contributions concerning the determination of base sequences in nucleic acids

name: Kenichi
contribution-sk: za ich teórie teórie v oblasti priebehu chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their theories, developed independently, concerning the course of chemical reactions

name: Roald
contribution-sk: za ich teórie teórie v oblasti priebehu chemických reakcií
contribution-en: for their theories, developed independently, concerning the course of chemical reactions

name: Aaron
contribution-sk: za jeho rozvoj kryštalografického elektrónového mikroskopu
contribution-en: for his development of crystallographic electron microscopy and his structural elucidation of biologically important nucleic acid-protein complexes

name: Henry
contribution-sk: za jeho prácu na mechanizme reakcií s presunom elektrónov
contribution-en: for his work on the mechanisms of electron transfer reactions, especially in metal complexes

name: Robert Bruce
contribution-sk: za jeho rozvoj metodológie chemickej syntézy na pevných matrixoch
contribution-en: for his development of methodology for chemical synthesis on a solid matrix

name: Herbert Aaron
contribution-sk: za ich úspechy vo vývoji priamych metód určovania kryštálových štruktúr
contribution-en: for their outstanding achievements in developing direct methods for the determination of crystal structures

name: Jerome
contribution-sk: za ich úspechy vo vývoji priamych metód určovania kryštálových štruktúr
contribution-en: for their outstanding achievements in developing direct methods for the determination of crystal structures

name: Dudley Robert
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky v oblasti dynamiky elementárnych chemických procesov
contribution-en: for their contributions concerning the dynamics of chemical elementary processes

name: Yuan Tseh
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky v oblasti dynamiky elementárnych chemických procesov
contribution-en: for their contributions concerning the dynamics of chemical elementary processes

name: John Charles
contribution-sk: za ich príspevky v oblasti dynamiky elementárnych chemických procesov
contribution-en: for their contributions concerning the dynamics of chemical elementary processes

name: Donald James
contribution-sk: za ich vývoj a použitie molekúl so štruktúrovo-špecifickými interakciami vysokej selektivity
contribution-en: for their development and use of molecules with structure-specific interactions of high selectivity

name: Jean-Marie
contribution-sk: za ich vývoj a použitie molekúl so štruktúrovo-špecifickými interakciami vysokej selektivity
contribution-en: for their development and use of molecules with structure-specific interactions of high selectivity

name: Charles John
contribution-sk: za ich vývoj a použitie molekúl so štruktúrovo-špecifickými interakciami vysokej selektivity
contribution-en: for their development and use of molecules with structure-specific interactions of high selectivity

name: Johann
contribution-sk: za ich práce o trojrozmernej štruktúre centier fotosyntézy
contribution-en: for their determination of the three-dimensional structure of a photosynthetic reaction centre

name: Robert
contribution-sk: za ich práce o trojrozmernej štruktúre centier fotosyntézy
contribution-en: for their determination of the three-dimensional structure of a photosynthetic reaction centre

name: Hartmut
contribution-sk: za ich práce o trojrozmernej štruktúre centier fotosyntézy
contribution-en: for their determination of the three-dimensional structure of a photosynthetic reaction centre

name: Sidney
contribution-sk: za ich objav katalytických vlastností RNA
contribution-en: for their discovery of catalytic properties of RNA

name: Thomas Robert
contribution-sk: za ich objav katalytických vlastností RNA
contribution-en: for their discovery of catalytic properties of RNA

name: Elias James
contribution-sk: za jeho rozvoj teórie a metodológie organickej syntézy
contribution-en: for his development of the theory and methodology of organic synthesis

name: Richard Robert
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky k rozvoju magnetickej nukleárnej rezonancie s vysokým rozlíšením
contribution-en: for his contributions to the development of the methodology of high resolution nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy

name: Rudolph Arthur
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevky k teórii reakcií s presunom elektrónov v chemických systémoch
contribution-en: for his contributions to the theory of electron transfer reactions in chemical systems

name: Kary Banks
contribution-sk: za príspevky k rozvoju metód v chémii DNA
contribution-en: for contributions to the developments of methods within DNA-based chemistry  for his invention of the polymerase chain reaction (PCR) method

name: Michael
contribution-sk: za príspevky k rozvoju metód v chémii DNA
contribution-en: for contributions to the developments of methods within DNA-based chemistry  for his fundamental contributions to the establishment of oligonucleotide-based, site-directed mutagenesis and its development for protein studies

name: George Andrew
contribution-sk: za jeho príspevok k chémii karbokatiónov
contribution-en: for his contribution to carbocation chemistry

name: Paul Josef
contribution-sk: za ich prácu na chémii atmosféry, hlavne na spotrebe ozónu
contribution-en: for their work in atmospheric chemistry, particularly concerning the formation and decomposition of ozone

name: Mario J.
contribution-sk: za ich prácu na chémii atmosféry, hlavne na spotrebe ozónu
contribution-en: for their work in atmospheric chemistry, particularly concerning the formation and decomposition of ozone

name: Frank Sherwood
contribution-sk: za ich prácu na chémii atmosféry, hlavne na spotrebe ozónu
contribution-en: for their work in atmospheric chemistry, particularly concerning the formation and decomposition of ozone

name: Robert F.
contribution-sk: za ich objavy fulerénov
contribution-en: for their discovery of fullerenes

name: Sir Harold W.
contribution-sk: za ich objavy fulerénov
contribution-en: for their discovery of fullerenes

name: Richard E.
contribution-sk: za ich objavy fulerénov
contribution-en: for their discovery of fullerenes

name: Paul Delos
contribution-sk: za ich objasnenie enzymatického mechanizmu v syntéze adenozíntrifosfátu (ATP)
contribution-en: for their elucidation of the enzymatic mechanism underlying the synthesis of adenosine triphosphate (ATP)

name: John Ernest
contribution-sk: za ich objasnenie enzymatického mechanizmu v syntéze adenozíntrifosfátu (ATP)
contribution-en: for their elucidation of the enzymatic mechanism underlying the synthesis of adenosine triphosphate (ATP)

name: Jens Christian
contribution-sk: za ich objav enzýmu na prenos iónov – Na+/K+-ATPázy
contribution-en: for the first discovery of an ion-transporting enzyme, Na+, K+ -ATPase

name: Walter
contribution-sk: za jeho rozvoj funkcionálnej teórie hustoty
contribution-en: for his development of the density-functional theory

name: Sir John Anthony
contribution-sk: za jeho rozvoj výpočtových metód v kvantovej chémii
contribution-en: for his development of computational methods in quantum chemistry

name: Ahmed Hassan
contribution-sk: za jeho štúdium prechodových stavov chemických reakcií použitím femtosekundovej spektroskopie
contribution-en: for his studies of the transition states of chemical reactions using femtosecond spectroscopy

name: Alan Jay
contribution-sk: za ich objav a rozvoj vodivých polymérov
contribution-en: for their discovery and development of conductive polymers

name: Alan G.
contribution-sk: za ich objav a rozvoj vodivých polymérov
contribution-en: for their discovery and development of conductive polymers

name: Hideki
contribution-sk: za ich objav a rozvoj vodivých polymérov
contribution-en: for their discovery and development of conductive polymers
